About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Aims to shape and improve the user experience through considering the effects of illustrations, photography, typography, space, layouts. All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for.

Testimonials

Take a look at what my clients say

Having one designer take on all of our work means he is constantly thinking about how everything fits together, and has been instrumental in our having a unified brand, which is a challenge since we do so many different things across different domains!

  • Sam Smith, New York

Working with JW really opened my eyes to the benefits of having a seriously talented, professional designer finish out our complex projects. We work on experimental design, and it's crucial to have output that reflects our identity as designers.

  • Chun Li, Shanghai

Before working with John, we struggled to get to the level we were aiming for, and now our corporate materials are on a whole new level of visually striking and professional. He is not only a gifted designer, but can help lead brands in the right direction.

  • Jill Johnson, London

I've worked with a number of designers in my career and I have to say John is the best by far. We worked with him on a recent project with multiple stakeholders and an extremely short timeline and were blown away by how good this guy really was.

  • Steve Thompson, Sydney
